Very good experience at the tooth dental & Orofacial clinic. 
Dr Jyoti Ahlawat is the leading lady of the centre. A very well experienced Doctor. Far better than my past dentist. We never knew the ideal standard of dental treatment unless we visited her.

My experience with the doctors at the tooth dental & Orofacial
Clinic vasundhara enclave was very very good. I am highly impressed with Dr Jyoti Ahlawat and Dr Abhimanyu Sharma. They are well learned set of doctors. Highly recommended if you want a painless dental treatment.

I visited Dr Jyoti Ahlawat for a Tooth with significant decay. Doctor at other clinic told me to get RCT done, I wanted second opinion where Dr Jyoti told me it can be managed with some minimally
Invasive filling. It saved my tooth and my money. Thanks Dr Ahlawat

They are charging money for x-ray, but when i ask for copy of x-ray film, they denied and said we can send you copy of c-ray on mail. But they didn’t sent the x ray on mail or whatsapp. If I want to go for second opinion, I have to pay again for x-ray.  ***************
reply_text:
Review reply

Hello
We always aim to provide top quality dental experience to each of our patients and take each and every feedback in a constructive light to improve our services. The digital radiograph has been emailed at the mail id mentioned by you in your patient registration form. We tried reaching you on the phone number that you provided via practo portal while booking appointment and at time of registration process with our staff, however despite numerous attempts at our end, the number stayed switched off /unavailable. We would also like to mention that despite multiple requests by our staff to wear shoe cover inside operatory area for disinfection & hygiene purposes, u chose to ignore that and walked in the surgical operatory with your slippers on a rainy day. We understand it can be challenging for a patient due to past dental experiences over a decade ago to understand the scientific difference between an IOPA X-ray where you are provided the x ray film and a digital format of imaging like RVG, however you insisted on a physical copy of X-ray while arguing and shouting at our front desk staff and at the attending doctor in front of other patients. This happens to be a significant event that we take very seriously since it compromises the dental environment for patients who are awaiting their treatment after you. We hope you give us a chance to improve your experience next time. Have a good day.

review: I was facing the problem of repeatedly broken fillings in my back teeth. My previous dentist used to give some or the other excuse for filling coming out on its own & again charge me on re doing the filling in same tooth. After reference from a colleague I came to see Dr Jyoti. She toh X-ray of my teeth and advised a special type of ceramic based filling - inlay.. which she said is best suited for my teeth situation. My treatment was done painlessly & gently. I am happy and satisfied with their services

Some years ago vasundhara enclave had very limited choice for Dentist. Now there are so many dental clinics in Vasundhara Enclave. On google I found so many names but Dr Jyoti & Dr Abhimanyu are only specialist with very advanced dental centre. It’s very hygienic and staff is also polite.

Dr. Jyoti Ahlawat is an exceptional dentist who performed my RCT procedure with utmost precision and care. The treatment was virtually painless, and I'm extremely satisfied with the results. Highly recommend her for any dental procedure!

Dr. Jyoti explained everything in detail before the procedure. She is experience and highly trustworthy.
I have replaced my old bridge (done elsewhere) with new zirconia bridge here yesterday and I feel good now. Thanks for her good job
Top most faculty fully satisfied with my experience I recommend u all to once try here u will be happy & satisfied

Dr Jyoti and Dr Abhimanyu ,very professional, nice person, answering any question about my case, i feel happy to find a skilled and professional doctor I recommend them.
Very professional and timely. Appointments have always started on time for me and I am out within, if not before, the expected appointment window. All staff are courteous, kind, and knowledgeable.
Professional and concise. I got an appointment fast for an emergency and was given several options. I didn't feel rushed or force to decide how best to deal with the problem.

Surprisingly I enjoyed my first visit. The way that Dr. Jyoti explained all my options to me made it easy for me to understand and prioritize my treatment. Highly recommend to anyone that is scared of going to the dentist.
This place is great! Dr Jyoti was wonderful, she took her time to clean my teeth and made me feel very comfortable. I highly recommend her for dental care

I had a repeat RCT done from Dr Jyoti for a tooth that was previously done elsewhere but i somehow developed gum swelling around that due to infection. Doctor is very experienced at skilled at using state of the art equipment. She used Laser technology for doing my RCT. I had never heard of any other dentist who does laser RCT in Delhi. I am glad I came to the right place, otherwise I would have surely lost my tooth

Doctor motivates you and guides you about the right treatment option. I got teeth implants and ceramic caps done. They follow complete Covid precautions and clinic is very neat and clean. Shoe covers are given to each person entering the clinic. All in all I had a very nice experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor and staff are accommodating of last minute emergency appointments. I had a sudden bout of tooth pain ..so had to come in on urgent basis. Dr Jyoti and Dr Abhimanyu checked my teeth ,took pictures, x-rays and explained the cause of my painful tooth. They explained the treatment in simple words with proper detail of charges and sittings. I had a nice experience here and will surely recommend the doctor

My father had severe tooth pain & swelling in cheek region over night. We called up Dr Jyoti early morning and she responded immediately and booked our consultation at her clinic. We were sure that tooth removal would be done for this case , however with her expertise, doctor managed to save the tooth by doing laser RCT. We were pleasantly surprised to find such proficient dentist who takes care of patients and gives it her all to provide best possible care.

Dr Jyoti provides detailed information on all your dental issues , including future consequences that my arise and guides you on how to maintain your teeth in best condition. I got Tooth coloured fillings & teeth whitening done here. Doctor is smooth & quick in her work & spends sufficient time on giving post treatment instructions and guidance. 5 stars !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my RCT and sacling done from Dr Jyoti Ahlawat and my experience was phenomenal. Dr Jyoti is one of best dentists in Delhi.
I had implant and zirconia caps done by Dr Abhimanyu. I am impressed by the skill and behavior of doctor. Fabulous experience

I came from Bihar from my TMJ problem. I was troubled due to pain for last 3 years and visited many doctors in my state. I found Dr Abhimanyu on Google and visited him.
Happy with my RCT & Crown. Nice doctors. Hygienic clinic. Very new advanced painless electric injection.
Happy with my INVISALIGN treatment. I found them charging very genuine in comparison to any other centre in Delhi where INVISALIGN treatment was very expensive.

First of all they didnot have their practo profile updated.. They are charging 500 and not 300 as consultation fees..
They took my xrays and billed 900 with 500 as consultation and 200 per xray.. they said my teeth needs RCTwhich will cost 10000 per tooth for basic cap... You may visit the clinic if you have a lot of money... I asked for atleast the temporary filling in order to relieve the pain for sometime and to prevent food getting struck.. but she said NO... 
So I end up paying for no treatment at all and still in pain...

Fabulous team of Doctors and staff at this clinic. Everything from appointment fixing to thorough sanitization steps we noticed on entering their set up to the treatment services we received has been nothing short of excellence. My father got full mouth implants & denture done from Dr Abhimanyu. He was extremely patient and detailed in our first consultation wherein he outlined the whole treatment plan, sittings, pros and cons and expenses transparently. We're more than happy with their services and I have already given references to my friends to visit here for any dental woes
